scenes.description: Performance of 'Lupin the Third Theme' (ルパン三世のテーマ).
scenes.song_name: Lupin the Third Theme (ルパン三世のテーマ)

scenes.description: Slot machine transition and Pekora singing 'Amazing Grace'.
'Miko Attack' battle parody sequence featuring various Hololive members.

subtitles.original: 背中で泣いてる 男の美学
subtitles.english: A man's aesthetics, weeping in the shadows

subtitles.original: 真珠の色は あいつのまなざし
subtitles.english: The color of pearls is in his gaze

subtitles.original: 遥かな幸せを 夢に描く
subtitles.english: Painting dreams of a far-off happiness

subtitles.original: いためることを 恐れるあまりに
subtitles.english: For fear of causing pain

subtitles.original: 冷たく突き放す 愛もあるさ
subtitles.english: There is a love that coldly pushes away

subtitles.original: 男には 自分の世界がある
subtitles.english: A man has his own world

subtitles.original: たとえるなら 風をはらい 荒れ狂う稲光
subtitles.english: If I were to compare it, it's like brushing away the wind, a raging bolt of lightning

subtitles.original: 都会の闇に 体を溶かして
subtitles.english: Melting into the city's darkness

subtitles.original: 口笛吹いてる 男の美学
subtitles.english: Whistling as he goes, a man's aesthetics

subtitles.original: Amazing Grace, how sweet the sound
subtitles.english: Amazing Grace, how sweet the sound

subtitles.original: That saved a wretch like me...
subtitles.english: That saved a wretch like me...

subtitles.original: That saved a wretch like me...
subtitles.english: That saved a wretch like me...

subtitles.original: $15 GET
subtitles.english: $15 GET

subtitles.original: ムコアタック 突入！
subtitles.english: Entering Miko Attack!

subtitles.original: いざ勝負！
subtitles.english: Let's battle!

subtitles.original: 勝負ぺこ！
subtitles.english: It's a showdown, peko!

subtitles.original: いざ勝負！
subtitles.english: Let's battle!

subtitles.original: 勝利
subtitles.english: Victory

subtitles.original: 楽勝ぺこ！
subtitles.english: Easy win, peko!

subtitles.original: 夜を彷徨う影が 光探そうと吠える
subtitles.english: The shadows wandering the night howl, searching for light

subtitles.original: 罪深き羊たち 来なさい容赦はしません
subtitles.english: Sinful sheep, come forth; I will show no mercy.

subtitles.original: 守るべき人のため 優しい心のため
subtitles.english: For the sake of the people I must protect, for the sake of a kind heart

subtitles.original: どんなに傷つこうと 祈りましょう
subtitles.english: No matter how much I get hurt, let's pray.

subtitles.original: 御意に誓う命かけて 救援を戦場、駆けて
subtitles.english: With lives pledged to the will, rushing to the battlefield for rescue.

subtitles.original: 信じた仲間たちと この手に宿る力信じて
subtitles.english: With the friends I believe in, believing in the power that resides in this hand.
